message:

http://programming-motherfucker.com/
name: Programming, Motherfucker - Do you speak it?
caption: programming-motherfucker.com
description: We are a community of motherfucking programmers who have been humiliated by software development methodologies for years.

data.message: I work with one of the biggest Agile advocates in Australia. I see the internal conversations that happen, and the agendas that are not necessarily shared with everyone else. And I tell you, all this thing about people doing this only for more billable hours and such is simply BS (yes, that's Bullshit). If this Zen guy has a problem with some people trying to game the system to their advantage, it doesn't mean that the system is made for those people's advantage. C'mon!
well, it's stated as a software development problem, I mean the lack of understanding and lack of communication between manager and clients at one side and programmers at the other side.
Looking at "They Really Value" column, this is about bad intentions not bad communication. Don't hire bastards to build your software and then blame the process.

Regarding the educational material and stuff (Wow, look at t-shirts, tell me guys when you buy one, you get a new title with it, well deserved!), see my first comment, not from an Arab or conservative source, but Pluralsight, I assume you know them.
